law.catch_line: The Authority may obtain funding for its operational expenses from:...

text.section:
The Authority may obtain funding for its operational expenses from:
a federal or State grant;
filing fees and administrative fees for complaints heard by the Authority as authorized under § 12-112(b)(1) of this subtitle; and
any other source.

Except as provided in subsection (a)(2) of this section, the Authority may not impose a charge or assessment against any person, directly or indirectly, to obtain funding for its operational expenses.
